text: Hi Emilio. Trying to send data from HubSpot to an ERP (Navision). On the destination side there's an endpoint waiting for a JSON in a specific format.

Hi everyone! I'm trying to use this instruction  <div class="element_with_background" style="background-image: url({{ module.image_background }})"> to create a tag with an image background from a module int the header blogpost. The problem: i can't find the image in the Editor after putting this tag in my code. I know i m doing something wrong, but i can't see any clue. Someone can help me?
i think you have to specify whether the image selector returns the URL or the image itself.
Are you trying to send contact data?

Hi, my name is Uzma. I need some help in integrating “The Events Calendar” app to HS. I have created HS developer account then created an app and now trying to connect HubSpot but it’s giving an error. Please help!

Hey, Im looking for help in recovering deleted blog posts. I had my blogpost copied over to a new listing template instead of the listing template being switch to over to the blog. Because of this i have lost old analytics and want to restore the deleted blog posts and then have my new listing switch over to them.
^if this is not the right place for this, could someone direct me to the correct channel?
